dashboard.label: Quick Start
dashboard.description: Get up and running in 5 minutes

div.style: padding: 30px; text-align: center;
div.p: Follow these simple steps to start using the Splunk Innovators Toolkit in your dashboards.

div.style: padding: 20px;
display: flex; gap: 20px; margin-bottom: 40px;
flex-shrink: 0; width: 50px; height: 50px; background: #FD1875; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold;
flex: 1;
div.p: Copy the splunk-innovators-toolkit folder to your Splunk apps directory:

div.style: background: #1F2527; border-radius: 8px; padding: 16px; font-family: monospace; font-size: 14px;

div.p: Then restart Splunk or the container.

div.style: display: flex; gap: 20px; margin-bottom: 40px;

flex: 1;
div.p: In your dashboard XML, add the stylesheet attribute to the dashboard tag:

div.style: background: #1F2527; border-radius: 8px; padding: 16px; font-family: monospace; font-size: 14px; overflow-x: auto;
margin-top: 16px; padding: 12px; background: rgba(253, 24, 117, 0.1); border-left: 4px solid #FD1875; border-radius: 4px;
div.span: The path uses .. to reference the toolkit app from your app.
